example.text: Biden talks about restoring the soul of our nation. Let’s remember we are a nation of immigrants. The Admin is proposing a rule banning people from seeking asylum in the US unless they seek it elsewhere first. Trump was the first to do this. [[user]] shouldn't be the second.

Yesterday, I introduced the Prairie Band Potawatomi Nation Shab-eh-nay Band Reservation Settlement Act. This bill will enable the Nation to reclaim a portion of land stolen nearly two centuries ago, and to be rightfully compensated. It's an important first step toward justice.
